content.7: But I will send a fire on the wall of Gaza, which shall devour the palaces thereof:
content.8: And I will cut off the inhabitant from Ashdod, and him that holdeth the sceptre from Ashkelon, and I will turn mine hand against Ekron: and the remnant of the Philistines shall perish, saith the Lord

content.12: But I will send a fire upon Teman, which shall devour the palaces of Bozrah.
